answers.text:
Hi Linda, 
Here are a few links you might find helpful in looking for downtown business grants to help with repairs.
•   This is a previously answered question about repairing old buildings where members suggested potential grants. Some of the suggested grants may also apply to your specific situation. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20348
•   Here is a case study from Sherman, TX where the local government created a business improvement and restoration grant to help their historic downtown district make the needed repairs. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/9239/Grants_for_Historic_Building_Restoration
•   This is a case study about a unique redevelopment plan to help businesses with improvement projects that are in line with the City of Grayslake, IL ‘s redevelopment plan. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/13431‎
I hope these documents provide you with the grant programs you are looking for. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA’s Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.text:
While it doesn't help so much with the funding element, I found a great example of a volunteer program that has been developed by the City of San Antonio, which may help you realize the work you are trying to accomplish. The STAR program that they developed has connected undergraduate students around San Antonio with valuable service projects that have benefited the city. You can read all about the program here (http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/304220/Students_Together_Achieving_Revitalization), and perhaps you will find that finding volunteer labor will help you when you eventually set to work with fixing the roofs. 
Please keep us updated on how your project comes together.

answers.text:
I would recommend checking on Community Development Block Grant revolving loan funds that might be available for businesses.  
Other options might include seeing if your local or regional economic development group could setup a revolving loan fund for business assistance.

author: Linda Jones
text: We are a city of around 3,000 and our downtown buildings are of course very old and a lot of them have failing roofs that need repair.  I would be interested in any programs your cities have done to help these businesses to repair  them.
title: Downtown business grants
